title: M2: Motion verbs in English and selected LOTEs
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 15 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German* ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: If you have access to Europarl2017 (for example, through Sketch Engine) you can add translations into other LOTEs from that source. Otherwise, find another parallel corpus and conduct a search for verbs that express manner of motion in English (try 'walk' or 'fly' to start with), and find examples of how the same idea is expressed in your target language. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Manner o f motion verbs are very well studied in linguistics. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verb_framing for more information.
